perturbation.original_text: In the performance of their obligations hereunder, the Parties agree to comply with all applicable laws of all Countries having jurisdiction over the activities performed under or stipulated by this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: In the performance of their obligations hereunder, the Parties agree to comply with the laws of Singapore having jurisdiction over the activities performed under or stipulated by this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: By limiting the applicable laws to only those of Singapore, the contract potentially violates consumer protection laws and other mandatory regulations of other countries where the APCN 2 operates. This introduces a legal risk as the parties are no longer explicitly bound to comply with all relevant laws.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Various consumer protection laws and regulations in countries where APCN 2 operates (e.g., data privacy laws, telecommunications regulations).

perturbation.original_text: Any such liabilities or costs incurred or benefits accruing in satisfying such obligations shall be divided among the Parties hereto in the proportions in which such Parties, interests are specified in Schedule B immediately preceding the time a Party terminates its participation in this Agreement or this Agreement is terminated pursuant to Subparagraph 18.1, whichever occurs first.
perturbation.changed_text: Any such liabilities or costs incurred shall be divided among the Parties hereto in the proportions in which such Parties, interests are specified in Schedule B immediately preceding the time a Party terminates its participation in this Agreement or this Agreement is terminated pursuant to Subparagraph 18.1, whichever occurs first.
perturbation.explanation: Removing 'or benefits accruing' means that benefits related to the resolution of claims will not be distributed according to Schedule B. This creates an imbalance, as only liabilities and costs are now addressed, which could be non-compliant with fairness principles in contract law.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General principles of fairness and good faith in contract law.

perturbation.original_text: Each Patty agrees to indemnify each of the other Parties in respect of all costs, expenses, damages and demands, arising out of or in connection with any claim against, or liability of, the latter as an owner of APCN 2 where such claim is made by, or the liability is to, any third party not being a Party hereto and arises out of or in connection with APCN 2 provided that no indemnifying Party shall be obligated to contribute more than its share of liability as per Schedule B.
perturbation.changed_text: Each Patty agrees to indemnify each of the other Parties in respect of all costs arising out of or in connection with any claim against, or liability of, the latter as an owner of APCN 2 where such claim is made by, or the liability is to, any third party not being a Party hereto and arises out of or in connection with APCN 2 provided that no indemnifying Party shall be obligated to contribute more than its share of liability as per Schedule B.
perturbation.explanation: By removing 'expenses, damages and demands,' the scope of the indemnification is severely limited. This introduces a legal contradiction with standard business practices and potentially applicable laws that would typically include these elements in an indemnification clause.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Standard indemnity principles and practices in contract law.
